business_information.business_description: Professional MOT testing and vehicle servicing. Established in 1979, we provide comprehensive automotive services including MOT testing, vehicle servicing, repairs, and maintenance to customers in Hendon and surrounding areas.

verification_documents_needed: Utility bill or bank statement showing business address

whatsapp_business_profile.about: Professional MOT testing and vehicle servicing. Call 0208 203 6449 to book your appointment. Serving Hendon since 1979.
whatsapp_business_profile.greeting_message: Hello! Welcome to ELI MOTORS LTD. We're here to help with your MOT and vehicle servicing needs. How can we assist you today?
